name: Who Killed Punk Rock?
description:
An interactive fiction punk-rock murder mystery. Years of fantastic legends you’ve heard from veterans in the scene has finally drawn you to make the pilgrimage to the bar on that side of town. Promised face-melting riffs and good beer, you venture alone to a pub you know nothing about apart from the tales of elder punks and the old crackhead who hangs around the gas station. Upon arrival, you’re met with the greatest show unearthed – the most killer punk rock to ever grace your ears and a pit that would’ve made CBGB’s blush. Everything is gravy until the band drops dead mid-chorus, and it is discovered that the doors are bolted shut and the landline’s been disconnected. Surrounded by unfamiliar faces and confusion, you must consult those trapped with you – a cast ranging from a disgruntled bartender to a dusty ex-groupie – to unravel who or what murdered the band and how you will get out of there.

Story content and game-play is complete, though I'd like to add more art before I call WKPR "complete".
